title: Complete project documentation
description: Write comprehensive documentation for the task management API, including setup instructions, API endpoints, and usage examples.

title: Review pull requests
description: Review and provide feedback on pending pull requests from the team.

title: Update dependencies
description: Check for outdated npm packages and update them to their latest stable versions.

title: Implement user authentication
description: Add JWT-based authentication system with login, register, and refresh token endpoints.

title: Write unit tests for task service
description: Create comprehensive unit tests covering all task CRUD operations and edge cases.

title: Fix responsive design issues
description: Address mobile responsiveness problems in the task list and detail views.

title: Setup CI/CD pipeline
description: Configure GitHub Actions for automated testing and deployment.

title: Optimize database queries
description: Review and optimize slow database queries, add necessary indexes.

title: Add task filtering and search
description: Implement advanced filtering by status, priority, and full-text search functionality.

title: Refactor task entity validation
description: Improve validation logic and error messages for better user experience.

title: Add task categories
description: Implement category system for organizing tasks into different groups.

title: Fix memory leak in task store
Design new dashboard UI
description: Create mockups and design specifications for the new task management dashboard.

title: Migrate to TypeORM 0.3
description: Update TypeORM to version 0.3 and refactor code to use new API.

title: Add email notifications
description: Implement email notifications for task assignments, due date reminders, and status changes.

title: Create API documentation
description: Generate Swagger/OpenAPI documentation for all endpoints.

title: Implement task comments feature
description: Allow users to add comments to tasks for collaboration and discussion.

title: Add dark mode support
description: Implement dark theme toggle and persist user preference.

title: Performance testing
description: Run load tests to identify bottlenecks and optimize performance.

title: Setup error monitoring
description: Integrate Sentry or similar service for error tracking and monitoring.
